verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, my heart longs to be A habitation fit for Thee. A place where peace reigns, And love can flourish, A place where You can feel at home.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}That You are God, You’re the Way, You’re the Truth and You’re the Life. King of kings, Lord of lords, Prince of peace, Lord Jesus Christ, And by Your shed blood, The Great Redeemer You saved my soul, You paid the price.{/lang-eng}
